title: Any special educators here? Need a questionnaire filled
selftext:
Hi guys, my friend is doing research on disability and education and need some responses for her questionnaire regarding it.

If any of you are special educators for intellectual disability, can you take a few minutes to answer a few questions? The study is qualitative in nature and the questions might be a little descriptive in nature.

 I am attaching a google form's link on my post.

[Here's the link](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeptx6jMArasQZYUXsb1pW96YAezQ_y4n2pU2OTlkK3Veuhmw/viewform?usp=sf_link)

Your help is greatly appreciated
